title: Config storage inventory
description: Inventory config items and current storage paths across core app and shared utils; include JSON, SQLite, and in-memory caches.
acceptance_criteria: Inventory doc/table lists each config item with storage location, format, owner, sync flag, and read/write frequency; covers apps/core-app, packages/utils, packages/tuffex.
review_initial_requirements: Verify coverage includes plugin storage and config dirs; check no missing high-traffic items.
review_regression_requirements: Re-run inventory diff after any config schema changes; ensure new items are classified.

title: Storage classification matrix
description: Classify each config item by sync requirement, size, sensitivity, and latency; define target storage per class.
acceptance_criteria: Each inventory item has a class label and target storage policy; unresolved items flagged with owner and deadline.
review_initial_requirements: Validate classification rules (sync vs local, cache vs source of truth) and edge cases.
review_regression_requirements: After migrations, confirm items remain in correct class; adjust policy for exceptions.

title: Source-of-truth decision
description: Decide authoritative source for sync-required data and document conflict rules (SQLite-first vs JSON-first).
acceptance_criteria: Decision doc defines source-of-truth per class, write direction, and conflict resolution; records owner sign-off status (approved/pending).
review_initial_requirements: Ensure no dual-write ambiguity; align with sync roadmap and data privacy.
review_regression_requirements: Verify downstream design docs reference the decision consistently.

title: Storage abstraction design
description: Design a storage interface with SQLite/JSON adapters, versioning, and read/write semantics.
acceptance_criteria: Interface spec includes methods, versioning, and adapter responsibilities; mapping table shows JSON to SQLite behavior.
review_initial_requirements: Check backward compatibility and migration hooks; avoid breaking existing APIs.
review_regression_requirements: Confirm adapters cover all required operations and error paths.

title: Migration and rollback plan
description: Draft per-item migration with fallback, import steps, and rollback strategy.
acceptance_criteria: Migration plan lists each candidate item with steps, fallback path, and rollback trigger; risk list included.
review_initial_requirements: Ensure data safety, backup strategy, and minimal downtime.
review_regression_requirements: Post-migration compare data parity between old and new stores.

title: Permission-center doc alignment
description: Update permission-center PRD and TODO statuses to match implementation and storage reality; list Phase 5 gaps.
acceptance_criteria: PRD and TODO updated with accurate completion status, storage choice noted, Phase 5 gaps enumerated.
review_initial_requirements: Cross-check with code and tests; avoid overstating completion.
review_regression_requirements: Re-validate doc status after any permission module changes.

title: Consolidated progress doc
description: Create a single progress document listing related PRDs, scope, implementation steps, and current status.
acceptance_criteria: New doc created with scope, how-to, progress checklist, and links to related PRDs; stored under docs/plan-prd/04-implementation/.
review_initial_requirements: Ensure all related PRDs are listed and status is evidence-based.
review_regression_requirements: Keep doc updated when milestones change; add changelog entry.

title: Pilot migration and test gates
description: Run a low-risk config migration pilot and define verification gates.
acceptance_criteria: Pilot item migrated with fallback verified; test gates documented (lint/typecheck/unit); no data loss observed.
review_initial_requirements: Confirm pilot scope is low-risk and rollback is tested.
review_regression_requirements: Repeat verification on a second item to validate process.
